import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Topbar({ isAuthenticated, user, onLogout }) { return (
{/* Sidebar Toggle (Topbar) */} {/* Topbar Navbar */}
    {/* Nav Item - User Information */} {isAuthenticated ? ( // If the user is authenticated, show user name and logout
  • {user.name} {/* Dropdown - User Information */}

    Logout
    • ) : ( // If the user is not authenticated, show login and create account links <>

); } export default Topbar;
